home.Jean-Baptiste drives the vision and stra: Jean-Baptiste drives the vision and strategy, blending creativity and leadership to shape every project's success.
home.Vladimir builds strong client relationsh: Vladimir builds strong client relationships and drives business growth with clarity and ambition.
home.Candice brings fresh energy and precisio: Candice brings fresh energy and precision, ensuring each project runs smoothly from idea to delivery.
home.Nathalie leads each project with precisi: Nathalie leads each project with precision, ensuring clarity, coordination, and client satisfaction.
home.Perrine ensures smooth day-to-day operat: Perrine ensures smooth day-to-day operations with precision, care, and unwavering dedication.
home.testimonial1: For this second year of collaboration, the Stand By Me team successfully evolved our booth by optimizing what already existed, all while remaining committed to a CSR approach. We are very satisfied working with Stand By Me, a local company that demonstrates great adaptability to the specific needs of an inter-professional organization. The setup went smoothly without a hitch!
home.testimonial2: We wanted to thank you for your help in setting up the UTMB Chamonix, which was a real success for HOKA! Your support was truly appreciated — thank you again for your responsiveness to our many requests!
home.testimonial3: This is the largest booth we’ve ever had, and every time we receive great feedback from our clients and partners about your stands. I want to commend your teams for their smooth communication, punctuality, and availability. The booth takedown was flawless. Once again, congratulations on this highly successful A+A edition!
